name: mri_create_t2combined
description: Utility to combine two or three T2* 7T partial-brain volumes into one volume, retaining resolution and registered to the MPRAGE anatomical.

inputs.name: Subject ID
inputs.description: Subject ID of the FreeSurfer anatomical

inputs.name: T2* 7T Partial Brain Middle Half
inputs.description: T2* 7T partial-brain middle half image, or enter 'none'

inputs.name: T2* 7T Combined Partial Brain Halves
inputs.description: Output file for T2* 7T combined partial-brain halves

inputs.name: Show Command
inputs.description: If the last argument is 'show', then the commands that will run are shown but not executed.

output-files.name: Log File
output-files.description: Log file generated by the command

output-files.name: T2* Combined Output
output-files.description: The T2* 7T combined partial-brain halves output file

author: FreeSurfer Developers
